languages.text: Самая сложная ситуация — на средних палубах, которые с самого начала бедствия остались без руководства с мостика. Из-за нарушения энергоснабжения отсек полностью отрезан от систем жизнеобеспечения. Люди паникуют, окруженные тьмой, а запасов кислорода им хватит максимум на полчаса.

traits.locale_text: Средние палубы охватила паника — отсек полностью отрезан от генераторов питания и систем жизнеобеспечения. Люди паникуют, окруженные тьмой, а запасов кислорода им хватит максимум на полчаса.

languages.text: The most problematic situation is on the middle decks, which have been left without any instructions from the bridge since the disaster began. Due to power supply failures, the bay has been completely cut off from the life support systems. The people, surrounded by darkness, are panicking, and their oxygen supply will last another half hour at most.
languages.original_text: Самая сложная ситуация — на средних палубах, которые с самого начала бедствия остались без руководства с мостика. Из-за нарушения энергоснабжения отсек полностью отрезан от систем жизнеобеспечения. Люди паникуют, окруженные тьмой, а запасов кислорода им хватит максимум на полчаса.

traits.locale_text: The most problematic situation is on the middle decks, which have been left without any instructions from the bridge since the disaster began. Due to power supply failures, the module has been completely cut off from the life support systems. The people, surrounded by darkness, are panicking, and their oxygen supply will last for another half hour at most.

The most problematic situation is on the middle decks, which have been left without any instructions from the bridge since the disaster began. Due to power supply failures, the module has been completely cut off from the life support systems. The people, surrounded by darkness, are panicking, and their oxygen supply will last for another half hour at most.

The most problematic situation is on the middle decks, which have been left without any instructions from the bridge since the disaster began. Due to power supply failures, the module has been completely cut off from the life support systems. The people, surrounded by darkness, are panicking, and their oxygen supply will last another half hour at most.

The most problematic situation is on the middle decks, which have been left without any instructions from the bridge since the disaster began. Due to power supply failures, the module has been completely cut off from the life support systems. The people, surrounded by darkness, are panicking, and their oxygen supply will last another half hour at most.

The most problematic situation is on the middle decks, which have been left without any instructions from the bridge since the disaster began. Due to power supply failures, the bay has been completely cut off from the life support systems. The people, surrounded by darkness, are panicking, and their oxygen supply will last another half hour at most.

languages.text: La situación más problemática está situada en las cubiertas centrales, que no reciben instrucciones del puente desde que ha empezado el desastre. A causa de varios fallos en el sistema de energía, la bahía ha quedado completamente aislada de los sistemas de soporte vital. La gente está sumida en la oscuridad y el pánico y el oxígeno que les queda no durará más de media hora en el mejor de los casos.
languages.original_text: The most problematic situation is on the middle decks, which have been left without any instructions from the bridge since the disaster began. Due to power supply failures, the bay has been completely cut off from the life support systems. The people, surrounded by darkness, are panicking, and their oxygen supply will last another half hour at most.

traits.locale_text: La situación más problemática está situada en las cubiertas centrales, que no reciben instrucciones del puente desde que ha empezado el desastre. A causa de varios fallos en el sistema de energía, el módulo ha quedado completamente aislado de los sistemas de soporte vital. La gente está sumida en la oscuridad y el pánico y el oxígeno que les queda no durará más de media hora en el mejor de los casos.

languages.text: 中层甲板的情况最为危急。自突发事件爆发之后，中层甲板始终没有从舰桥那边收到过任何指示。由于电源发生故障，中层甲板的生命维持系统已被完全切断。黑暗之中的人们惊慌失措，他们的氧气供应最多只能再维持半小时。
languages.original_text: The most problematic situation is on the middle decks, which have been left without any instructions from the bridge since the disaster began. Due to power supply failures, the bay has been completely cut off from the life support systems. The people, surrounded by darkness, are panicking, and their oxygen supply will last another half hour at most.

traits.locale_text: 中层甲板的情况最为危急。自突发事件爆发之后，中层甲板始终没有从舰桥那边收到过任何指示。由于电源发生故障，中层甲板的生命维持系统已被完全切断。黑暗之中的人们惊慌失措，他们的氧气供应最多只能再维持半小时。

languages.text: 一番困った状況なのは中層デッキで、災害発生以来、ブリッジから何の指示もなく放置されている。電源障害のせいでベイは生命維持システムから完全に切り離されてしまった。暗闇に包まれた者達はパニックに陥り、酸素の供給は長くてもあと30分しか持たないだろう。
languages.original_text: The most problematic situation is on the middle decks, which have been left without any instructions from the bridge since the disaster began. Due to power supply failures, the bay has been completely cut off from the life support systems. The people, surrounded by darkness, are panicking, and their oxygen supply will last another half hour at most.

traits.locale_text: 一番困った状況なのは中層デッキで、災害発生以来、ブリッジから何の指示もなく放置されている。電源障害のせいでベイは生命維持システムから完全に切り離されてしまった。暗闇に包まれた者達はパニックに陥り、酸素の供給は長くてもあと30分しか持たないだろう。

languages.text: Am problematischsten ist die Lage auf den mittleren Decks, die seit dem Beginn der Katastrophe keine Anweisungen von der Brücke erhalten haben. Aufgrund von Stromausfällen wurde die Bucht vollständig von den Lebenserhaltungssystemen abgeschnitten. Die Menschen sitzen panisch im Dunkeln, und ihr Sauerstoffvorrat reicht höchstens noch für eine halbe Stunde.
languages.original_text: The most problematic situation is on the middle decks, which have been left without any instructions from the bridge since the disaster began. Due to power supply failures, the bay has been completely cut off from the life support systems. The people, surrounded by darkness, are panicking, and their oxygen supply will last another half hour at most.

languages.text: La situation la plus problématique concerne les ponts intermédiaires, qui n'ont reçu aucune instruction de la passerelle depuis le début du désastre. À cause des coupures de courant, la baie s'est retrouvée totalement isolée des systèmes de survie. Plongés dans l'obscurité, les passagers commencent à céder à la panique et ne tiendront qu'une demi-heure tout au plus avec l'oxygène qui reste en réserve.
languages.original_text: The most problematic situation is on the middle decks, which have been left without any instructions from the bridge since the disaster began. Due to power supply failures, the bay has been completely cut off from the life support systems. The people, surrounded by darkness, are panicking, and their oxygen supply will last another half hour at most.

traits.locale_text: La situation la plus problématique concerne les ponts intermédiaires, qui n'ont reçu aucune instruction de la passerelle depuis le début du désastre. À cause des coupures de courant, le module s'est retrouvé totalement isolé des systèmes de survie. Plongés dans l'obscurité, les passagers commencent à céder à la panique et ne tiendront qu'une demi-heure tout au plus avec l'oxygène qui reste en réserve.

languages.text: En müşkül durumda olan yer, felaketin başlamasından bu yana köprüden herhangi bir talimat alamamış orta güverteler. Güç kaynağı arızaları nedeniyle bölmenin yaşam destek sistemleriyle bağlantısı tümüyle kopuk. Karanlıkta kalan insanlar panikliyor, oksijen kaynakları ise en fazla yarım saat daha dayanacak gibi görünüyor.
languages.original_text: The most problematic situation is on the middle decks, which have been left without any instructions from the bridge since the disaster began. Due to power supply failures, the bay has been completely cut off from the life support systems. The people, surrounded by darkness, are panicking, and their oxygen supply will last another half hour at most.

traits.locale_text: Felaketin başlamasından bu yana köprüden herhangi bir talimat alamamış orta güverteler en müşkül durumda. Güç kaynağı arızaları nedeniyle bölmenin yaşam destek sistemleriyle bağlantısı tümüyle koptu. Karanlıkta kalan insanlar panikliyor, oksijen kaynakları ise en fazla yarım saat daha dayanacak.
